name: Matryona's Last Night (itch)
description:
"For now, I'll sleep..."

"A pretty, adorable girl." It is how everyone sees Matryona; quiet, beautiful, intelligent—truly the most perfect daughter anyone could ever wish for.  ...But what is it that truly lies beneath such a perfect demeanour? What feelings lay in Matryona's own heart? 

Matryona's Last Night is a short, serious exploration game created by Colonel using the RPG Maker VX Ace engine, and was first released on the 11th of December 2016. The English version was translated by HiragiHOUX in2017, and then re-translated and re-released on the  2nd of November 2022.

The game takes roughly 15 minutes, with two separate endings. It is strictly exploration, with zero puzzle elements. 

This game contains upsetting content/themes, violence, and scenes of discrimination.

Characters Matryona The game's protagonist. The perfect daughter. Adorable, pretty Matryona. Other Versions

[Japanese Version]
